      • validateSalt

        public boolean validateSalt(java.lang.String pSalt)
        Validate a salt.

        The policy for a token's salt is:

        • At least 8 chars

        • No longer than 50 chars

        Parameters:
        pSalt - The salt to validate.
        Returns:
        ok

        public boolean validateCaptchaStr(java.lang.String pCaptchaStr)

        The policy for a token's captcha is:

        • At least 5 chars

        • No longer than 15 chars
